TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi sealed OutputCacheSettingsSection extends System.Configuration.ConfigurationSection
Public NotInheritable Class OutputCacheSettingsSection Inherits ConfigurationSection

Docs.summary: Configures the output cache settings for application pages . This class cannot be inherited.

remarks.format:
## Remarks The <xref:System.Web.Configuration.OutputCacheSettingsSection> class allows you to programmatically access and modify the `outputCacheSettings` element of the `caching` section in a configuration file. The output cache settings define the dependencies (the relationships between items stored in the cache and files, cache keys, or <xref:System.Web.Caching.CacheDependency> objects) that are used in output caching, for instance, by the [@ OutputCache](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/28a9e101-fb44-4198-9cb6-b8a52312fec2) directive or by the <xref:System.Web.Configuration.OutputCacheProfile>.
> [!NOTE] > The <xref:System.Web.Configuration.OutputCacheSettingsSection> can write information into the related section of the configuration file according to the restrictions defined by the section property <xref:System.Configuration.SectionInformation.AllowDefinition%2A> whose value is <xref:System.Configuration.ConfigurationAllowDefinition.MachineToApplication>. Any attempt to write in a configuration file at a level not allowed in the hierarchy will result in an error message generated by the parser. However, you can use this class to read configuration information at any level in the hierarchy.
## Examples The following code example shows how to obtain the <xref:System.Web.Configuration.OutputCacheSettingsSection> object from the configuration file of an existing Web application.
[!code-csharp[System.Web.Configuration.OutputCacheSettingsSection#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.Configuration.OutputCacheSettingsSection/CS/OutputCacheSettingsSection.cs#1)] [!code-vb[System.Web.Configuration.OutputCacheSettingsSection#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.Configuration.OutputCacheSettingsSection/VB/OutputCacheSettingsSection.vb#1)]

Docs.related: Setting the Cacheability of a Page

remarks.format: ## Remarks The <xref:System.Web.Configuration.OutputCacheSettingsSection.%23ctor%2A> constructor is not intended to be used directly from your code. It is called by the ASP.NET configuration system. You obtain an instance of the <xref:System.Web.Configuration.OutputCacheSettingsSection> class by using the <xref:System.Configuration.Configuration.GetSection%2A> method.

MemberSignature.Value: Public ReadOnly Property OutputCacheProfiles As OutputCacheProfileCollection

remarks.format:
## Remarks The <xref:System.Web.Configuration.OutputCacheSettingsSection.OutputCacheProfiles%2A> property allows you to programmatically access the `outputCacheProfiles` element in a configuration file. You can use the <xref:System.Web.Configuration.OutputCacheSettingsSection.OutputCacheProfiles%2A> property to modify the `outputCacheProfiles` element programmatically.
The `outputCacheProfiles` section contains <xref:System.Web.Configuration.OutputCacheProfile> objects that represent output cache settings that may be used by pages in the application. These settings can be applied to a page by setting the `CacheProfile` attribute of the [@ OutputCache](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/28a9e101-fb44-4198-9cb6-b8a52312fec2) directive. Apply the profile to control caching attributes such as dependencies, cache location, and cache expiration time.
The [@ OutputCache](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/28a9e101-fb44-4198-9cb6-b8a52312fec2) directive can override all the settings contained by an <xref:System.Web.Configuration.OutputCacheProfile> except the <xref:System.Web.Configuration.OutputCacheProfile.Enabled%2A> property. This is to ensure you can enable or disable the <xref:System.Web.Configuration.OutputCacheProfile> without having to modify the directives in all the pages that might have overridden it.
## Examples The following code example shows how to use the <xref:System.Web.Configuration.OutputCacheSettingsSection.OutputCacheProfiles%2A> property.
[!code-csharp[System.Web.Configuration.OutputCacheSettingsSection#3](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.Configuration.OutputCacheSettingsSection/CS/OutputCacheSettingsSection.cs#3)] [!code-vb[System.Web.Configuration.OutputCacheSettingsSection#3](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.Configuration.OutputCacheSettingsSection/VB/OutputCacheSettingsSection.vb#3)]
